serviceDetail.processSubtitle: We follow a structured approach to deliver exceptional results for our projects.
serviceDetail.contactCTA: Let's discuss how our services can help you achieve your business goals.

webDevelopment.longDescription: Our web development team creates custom websites that not only look great but also function flawlessly. We focus on creating responsive, user-friendly, and SEO-optimized websites that help businesses achieve their goals online.
benefits: Increased visibility in search engines
Improved user engagement and lower bounce rates
Higher conversion rates with optimized user journeys
Professional brand image through polished design
Competitive advantage with cutting-edge technology

process.title: Discovery
process.description: We begin by understanding your business goals, target audience, and requirements to create a project roadmap.

process.title: Planning
process.description: Our team creates wireframes and prototypes to visualize the website structure and user flow.

process.title: Design
process.description: We design visually appealing interfaces that align with your brand identity and enhance user experience.

process.title: Development
process.description: Our developers write clean, efficient code to bring the designs to life with all the required functionality.

process.title: Testing
process.description: Rigorous testing ensures your website works perfectly across devices and browsers.

process.title: Launch
process.description: We deploy your website to a production environment, ensuring everything is set up for success.

mobileDevelopment.longDescription: Our mobile development services deliver high-quality apps for iOS and Android platforms. Whether you need a native app or a cross-platform solution, our team creates mobile experiences that engage users and drive business growth.
benefits: Expanded reach to mobile users
Improved customer engagement through personalized experiences
New revenue streams through mobile commerce
Enhanced brand loyalty with seamless mobile interactions
Competitive advantage in the mobile-first market

process.title: Requirements Analysis
process.description: We gather detailed requirements to understand the app's purpose, target audience, and core functionality.

process.title: UI/UX Design
process.description: Our designers create intuitive, platform-specific interfaces that follow mobile design best practices.

process.title: Development
process.description: Our development team builds the app using either native technologies or cross-platform frameworks based on your needs.

process.title: Testing
process.description: We conduct thorough testing on real devices to ensure performance, usability, and compatibility.

process.title: Deployment
process.description: We handle the app submission process to get your app published on the App Store and Google Play.

process.title: Maintenance
process.description: Ongoing support and updates keep your app running smoothly and up-to-date with platform changes.

uiUxDesign.longDescription: Our UI/UX design services focus on creating intuitive and engaging user experiences. We combine aesthetic appeal with functional design to create interfaces that users love to interact with, enhancing satisfaction and driving conversion.
benefits: Improved user satisfaction and engagement
Reduced user frustration and support costs
Higher conversion rates with optimized user journeys
Consistent brand experience across all touchpoints
Data-driven design decisions based on user research

process.title: Research
process.description: We conduct user research to understand behavior patterns, needs, and pain points.

process.title: User Personas
process.description: We create detailed user personas to guide the design process and ensure user-centricity.

process.title: Information Architecture
process.description: We organize content and functionality in a way that's intuitive and easy to navigate.

process.title: Wireframing
process.description: Low-fidelity wireframes outline the basic structure and layout of the interface.

process.title: Visual Design
process.description: We create high-fidelity mockups that showcase the final look and feel of the interface.

process.title: Prototyping
process.description: Interactive prototypes simulate the user experience for testing before development.

digitalMarketing.longDescription: Our digital marketing services help businesses increase their online visibility and attract qualified leads. We develop comprehensive strategies that leverage various digital channels to reach your target audience and drive measurable results.
benefits: Increased brand awareness and online visibility
Higher quality leads through targeted campaigns
Improved ROI compared to traditional marketing
Data-driven insights for continuous optimization
Scalable marketing solutions that grow with your business

process.title: Audit & Analysis
process.description: We analyze your current digital presence and identify opportunities for improvement.

process.title: Strategy Development
process.description: We create a tailored digital marketing strategy aligned with your business goals.

process.title: Channel Selection
process.description: We identify the most effective channels to reach your target audience.

process.title: Content Creation
process.description: Our team develops engaging content that resonates with your audience.

process.title: Campaign Execution
process.description: We launch and manage campaigns across selected digital channels.

process.title: Monitoring & Optimization
process.description: Continuous monitoring and optimization ensure maximum campaign performance.

contentStrategy.longDescription: Our content strategy services help you create and distribute valuable content that attracts, engages, and retains your target audience. We develop comprehensive content plans that support your business objectives and establish your brand as an authority in your industry.
benefits: Increased organic traffic through valuable content
Enhanced brand authority and thought leadership
Improved engagement across digital touchpoints
Higher conversion rates with strategic content
Consistent brand messaging across all channels

process.title: Content Audit
process.description: We assess your existing content to identify gaps and opportunities.

process.title: Audience Research
process.description: We develop detailed audience personas to understand content preferences and needs.

process.title: Strategy Development
process.description: We create a comprehensive content strategy aligned with your business goals.

process.title: Content Calendar
process.description: We develop an editorial calendar to organize and schedule content creation.

process.title: Content Creation
process.description: Our team creates high-quality content that engages your target audience.

process.title: Distribution & Promotion
process.description: We implement strategies to distribute your content across relevant channels.

ecommerceSolutions.longDescription: Our e-commerce solutions provide businesses with everything they need to sell products online successfully. From storefront design to payment processing and inventory management, we build scalable e-commerce platforms that drive sales and growth.
benefits: Expanded market reach beyond physical limitations
24/7 sales capability with automated processes
Improved customer experience with personalized shopping
Data-driven insights into customer behavior
Scalable solution that grows with your business

process.title: Requirements Analysis
process.description: We gather detailed requirements for your e-commerce platform.

process.title: Platform Selection
process.description: We help you choose the right e-commerce platform based on your needs.

process.title: Store Design
process.description: Our designers create an attractive, conversion-optimized storefront.

process.title: Development
process.description: We implement all required functionality for a complete e-commerce solution.

process.title: Integration
process.description: We integrate payment gateways, shipping solutions, and other necessary services.

process.title: Testing & Launch
process.description: Thorough testing ensures everything works perfectly before going live.

about.title: About Cognitix
about.subtitle: Bringing innovation to every pixel since 2015
about.story: Cognitix was founded with a simple but powerful mission: to help businesses leverage technology to achieve their goals. What started as a small team of passionate developers has grown into a full-service digital agency with a global client base.
about.mission: Our mission is to deliver innovative digital solutions that drive growth and success for our clients. We believe that technology should work for people, not the other way around.

innovation.description: We stay ahead of technology trends and continuously evolve our approaches

messages.success: Thank you for contacting us. We'll get back to you soon.
messages.error: There was an error sending your message. Please try again.
messages.privacyError: Please agree to the Privacy Policy

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: Welcome to Cognitix. We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This privacy policy will inform you how we protect your personal data when you visit our website and will inform you about your privacy rights and how the law protects you.

dataWeCollect.title: Data We Collect
dataWeCollect.content: We may collect, use, store, and transfer various types of personal data about you, which we have grouped as follows:
dataWeCollect.personalData: Personally identifiable information (name, email address, phone number)
dataWeCollect.technicalData: Technical data including IP address, browser type and version, time zone and location, operating system, and platform
dataWeCollect.usageData: Information about how you use our website and services

howWeUseData.title: How We Use Your Data
howWeUseData.content: We will only use your personal data when the law permits us to. Most often, we will use your personal data in the following circumstances:
howWeUseData.providingServices: To provide you with the services you have requested from us
howWeUseData.improvingWebsite: To improve our website and services
howWeUseData.marketing: To send you marketing communications if you have opted to receive them

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We have implemented appropriate security measures to prevent your personal data from being accidentally lost, used, or accessed in an unauthorized manner, altered, or disclosed.

yourRights.title: Your Rights
yourRights.content: Under certain circumstances, you have rights under data protection laws regarding your personal data, including the right to:
yourRights.access: Request access to your personal data
yourRights.correction: Request correction of your personal data
yourRights.erasure: Request erasure of your personal data
yourRights.restriction: Request restriction of the processing of your personal data
yourRights.transfer: Request the transfer of your personal data
yourRights.objection: Object to the processing of your personal data

contactUs.title: Contact Us
contactUs.content: If you have any questions regarding this privacy policy or our privacy practices, please contact us at cognitix_web_dev@proton.me

agents.metaDescription: Connect with Cognitix Solutions' global agents for personalized assistance and expert consultation in your region.
agents.title: Our Global Agents
agents.subtitle: Connect with our regional agents for personalized service and expert consultation tailored to your needs.

contactForm.title: Contact {{name}}
contactForm.description: Fill out the form below to send a message directly to this agent. They will get back to you as soon as possible.
